title: Drawing, 1917-4-269-a, September 1, 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-blue paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations: green; again, at bottom left:  Presented 1917 / by Mr. Louis P. Church 8 [?] 04 [or7?]; and again, at bottom right: Sept 1st // 68 / Two parts  E
description: Vertical view of the right half of a steep valley still covered with traces snow in the left foreground leading to a snow capped mountain peak in the distance.
